text:
[Verse]
Lights are flashing city glow
Footsteps echo here we go
Empty alleys stories told
Midnight secrets all unfold

[Verse 2]
Neon signs and faded dreams
Concrete jungle silent screams
Shadowed faces in the night
Staying hidden out of sight

[Chorus]
We keep on walking
Midnight streets are talking
Whispers and laughter
Memories are after

[Verse 3]
Broken hearts and healing scars
Distant sound of speeding cars
Souls that wander in the dark
Searching for that single spark

[Verse 4]
Street lights flicker guide the way
Holding on till break of day
Through the haze and through the mist
Every moment’s a fleeting kiss

[Bridge]
Chasing moments finding peace
In the chaos find release
Through the night we find our place
In these streets we see our face
title: Midnight Streets
